name: Sweet potato custard
description: Just an overnight steep required... Pretty sure yam is now available at ecx and bcf.
author: Thadentman

reviews.text: This is really good. Steeped it for a week. It is very well balanced some recipes i have tried with FLV Yam the yam is alittle too powerful but this one the cream and yam ratio is about perfect been vaping on it for 2 days straight and still haven’t got tired of it which is pretty rare for me excellent job and thanks for sharing.
This stuff is great even after a shake. When i got YAM i knew it smelled so good. This recipe has the perfect amount of sweet to savory with that light dose of cinnamon.. great job my dude
